name: The Caves of Darkness
description:
The Quest

Your goal is to help Nite make it through the Cave of Darkness to prevent the Shadow of Despair from taking over the planet!

Use your skills to defeat enemies without injuring yourself, or else you'll have to start over the room you are in!

The further you travel, the more complex the cave systems get...

The Characters

Nite:

The main character. Nite's goal is to traverse through the Cave of Darkness to defeat the Shadow of Despair.

Bat:

This creature flies around the ceiling, waiting for its prey to walk by. Then it swoops in, ready to bite...

Eye of All:

Do not be fooled, this creature is not an egg! It is a bouncy eye and will jump on anyone who gets in its way.

Lava Cloud:

This creature slugs around, burning everything it touches.


Shadow of Despair:

The threatening entity that Nite must defeat...

Controls

W: Jump
A: Move Left
S: Move Down
D: Move Right
